title: Proposal Evaluation and Standardization (PES) Standards
description: Defines lookup tables and thresholds used by the L0/L2 proposal verification engine (PESE) to automatically determine GSC validation context and preliminary metrics based on target type.

RED.description: High integrity targets requiring multi-layered cryptographic and simulation verification.

YELLOW.description: Operational targets requiring rigorous testing but isolated failure modes.

GREEN.description: Data layers; lowest critical integrity requirement for SST.
